Admin:
	user: root
	pass: M!r4nd@

Miranda:
	user: miranda
	pass: miranda2025

Run Docker container:
% docker run --name mongo -p 27017:27017 -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=root  -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD='M!r4nd@'   -d amd64/mongo:4.4

Check content:
% mongosh --username miranda
> use miranda
> db.contextdata.find()

[contextdata is the document name]
